basics.name: Unspecified
basics.label: Electrical Engineer
basics.summary: Seasoned Electrical Engineer successful at coordinating diverse projects, improving departmental processes and increasing revenue. Electrical Engineer proficient in power and control engineering. Designs power grids as well as control systems for oil and gas industry. Seasoned Electrical Engineer offering 5 years experience developing HMI controlled equipment for testing and production. Strong project management background.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Implementing electrical engineering principles to troubleshoot and solve complex problems. Managed various projects resulting in high efficiency and cost savings.
highlights: Managed Dual Fluid Pumper (DFP) Unit Project
Managed the R&D Frac Pump Testing facility project

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Implemented pump test design changes and new tooling for Autofrettage, Pump Assembly and Pump Test that was more ergonomically efficient for operators and mechanics.
highlights: Implemented pump test design changes that eliminated downtown by 80%
Designed power distribution and control for medium and high voltage motors and vfd's for hydraulic lube circuits
Designed tooling fixtures and had ergonomically efficient equipment installed to LEAN Pump Assembly

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Troubleshot and repaired mail processing equipment.
highlights: Troubleshot and repaired mail processing equipment that consisted of vfd's, SLC500 PLC's, Baldor motors, Eaton gearboxes and MCC panels

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Aircraft handler duties and troubleshooting and repairs of electrical components of aircraft.
highlights: Navy Pistol Marksmanship Ribbon, Armed Forces Expeditionary Medal, Navy Sea Service Deployment Ribbon, Navy Good Conduct Medal Ribbon.

courses: Coursework in Electro-technology, Thermodynamics and Electronics
